actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretaries of the Military departments to waive for a period of one year, in the case of female applicants and nominees to the service academies under the respective jurisdictions of such secretaries, the maximum age limitation for admission to such academies.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretaries of the military departments to waive for a period of one year the maximum age limitations applicable to their respective service academies for female applicants and nominees.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretaries of the Military departments to waive for a period of one year, in the case of female applicants and nominees to the service academies under the respective jurisdictions of such secretaries, the maximum age limitation for admission to such academies.
